title: Contact
section: What to include in your inquiry
text:
What to include in your inquiry
To make the first call productive, please include:

A short description of your use case and why it matters
What outcome you want (and how you’d measure success)
Your current state: data availability, systems, and constraints
Timeline and key stakeholders
Any security / compliance requirements

title: About
text:
InertialRange Labs AB is a AI consulting practice run by Farrukh Nauman.
I have a PhD in Computational Astrophysics (University of Rochester) and held research roles at the Niels Bohr Institute and Chalmers University of Technology. In industry, I’ve led applied AI and GenAI delivery as an AI researcher/consultant at RISE, and as an interim team lead for Data Science & Advanced Analytics at a global industrial manufacturer.
At RISE, I led Vinnova-funded applied AI projects (project lead, ~9M SEK) and contributed as AI lead to EU initiatives (~2M SEK), delivering pilot-ready systems and public artifacts.
Across engagements, I focus on shipping systems that create measurable impact — including 40% faster inspection workflows, 50%+ lower data collection costs via synthetic data, and 90% lower hardware costs for industrial edge AI.

title: About
text:
Why this company exists
Most AI initiatives fail for predictable reasons: poor evaluation setup, underestimating data readiness, and a gap between prototypes and production. InertialRange exists to remove those failure modes with a focus on early-stage evaluation, clear scope, and delivery-oriented execution.
Running my own company also lets me choose the right roles and engagements — the ones where I can take real ownership and deliver outcomes.

title: InertialRange Labs AB
text:
I help teams validate AI opportunities, run fixed-scope pilots, and de-risk delivery with senior technical leadership.





Assess data readiness, clarify success metrics, and identify the fastest path to value.



Build and validate a pilot with defined deliverables, evaluation, and a clear handoff plan.



Ongoing architecture, roadmap, and engineering leadership to ship production-grade AI.








NoteFounder credibility



Farrukh Nauman, PhD (Computational Astrophysics). Former research scientist at the Niels Bohr Institute and Chalmers. AI team lead and principal consultant with delivered outcomes including 40% faster inspection workflows, 50%+ lower data collection costs via synthetic data, and 90% lower hardware costs for industrial edge AI.

title: Services
text:
These engagements are designed for teams who want senior AI/GenAI delivery without an open-ended project.



Clarify the use case, assess data readiness, and identify the fastest path to value.
You leave with:

A data readiness assessment (quality, access, gaps)
Success metrics and an evaluation approach
A risk register plus recommended next steps




Build and validate a pilot with defined deliverables, evaluation, and a clear handoff plan.
You leave with:

Acceptance criteria agreed up front
A working pilot and evaluation results
A production handoff plan (architecture + next-step roadmap)




Ongoing architecture, roadmap, and engineering leadership to ship production-grade AI.
You get:

Senior technical leadership and stakeholder alignment
Technical direction for GenAI/ML systems, MLOps, and governance
Reviews, unblockers, and delivery accountability

title: Services
text:
How it works

Intro call: a short conversation to assess fit and define the problem.
Scope: a lightweight proposal with deliverables, timeline, and dependencies.
Kickoff: align on success criteria and get access to data/systems.
Delivery: weekly check-ins and fast feedback cycles.
Handoff: deliverables, documentation, and a clear next-step roadmap.
